title: Spike Ball
summaries: The Spike Ball is an indestructible enemy found in the Dungeon which resembles a mace that swings around in a circle from a central pivot point (which cannot be destroyed either), and deals damage to the player on contact. Separate Spike Balls can have differing chain lengths. They spawn and despawn off-screen like any other enemy â€“ if the player leaves a room and returns later, it will have a different configuration of Spike Balls. They are much more likely to appear in Dungeon areas where there are Slab Walls.

statistics.Damage: 32/64/96
statistics.Max Life: 100/200/300
